EmailTemplate.description: A note to discuss the low credit line and options for managing
EmailTemplate.name: CSS - Credit Line Managing
EmailTemplate.subject: Your WEX Fleet Card Account Credit Line
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
{!Contact.Salutation} {!Contact.LastName},
I hope this message finds you well.
I wanted to check in with you regarding the credit line and billing specifics regarding your WEX Universal Fleet Account. Your monthly spend is expected to be ------- and your credit line is --------. Typically the credit line should be 2 1/2 or 3 times the monthly spend to manage normal 26 day billing cycles. If your line is less than that, there are the following options we suggest you select from to operate within the credit line:
Set calendar reminder for mid-month for partial payment Setup auto-pay monthly or tri-monthly Use electronic invoice and reports not mailed ones - more time You can push online payment to checking account instead of mail Provide additional deposit to increase the credit line
My main priority is your satisfaction and making sure you stay within the credit line on your account. If there is an interest to talk further on this, please call me directly anytime at {!User.Phone}. I am more than happy to assist you in any way I can.
Sincerely,
{!User.FirstName} {!User.LastName}
{!User.Title} Phone - {!User.Phone} {!User.Email}
http://www.wexinc.com/
CONFIDENTIALITY NOTICE: "This message contains confidential information of Wright Express Corporation. It is intended only for the use of the designated recipient(s) stated above and further distribution of the information is prohibited. If you have received this message in error, please notify sender immediately by telephone or reply by e-mail and delete the entire message and any attachments."
Wright Express Corporation, 97 Darling Avenue, South Portland, ME 04106
